casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Francisco ECHEVERRIA No. 131P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, Francisco Echeverria, for Echeverria, Francisco. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender. Peter A. Regulski, Assistant Attorney Geneal, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina Francisco.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of April 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
